title: Best of The Program | 3/1/21
description:
A second former aide has come out and accused Andrew Cuomo of sexual misconduct. Glenn takes time to hear from his audience and get their opinion on what he should focus on. Even Fox News is writing articles on Trump-supporting “domestic terrorists” after the acting chief of the Capitol Police claimed extremists are plotting to “blow up the Capitol." But where’s the FBI on that claim? A caller says our children need more mentors.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
